A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Cool CGI and fight scenes\, rogue squadronish. What Rian did to Luke is a travesty and has destroyed my faith on the direction of the film. Rey is a Mary Sue\, completely unbelievable but this was the same as Force Awakens. Characters all lack depth\, in the attempt to discard the old in the favor of the new\, it's only Star Wars superficially.
